20 #define USB_DEV_RUNTIME_DFU_SW_REQ_VALUE 0x55AA55AA
21 
22 void usb_dev_runtime_dfu_init(void);
23 void usb_dev_runtime_dfu_reset_event(void);
24 extern volatile usb_dev_dfu_status_t usb_dev_runtime_dfu_status;
25 static inline uint8_t usb_dev_runtime_dfu_get_state(void) MCU_ALWAYS_INLINE;
26 uint8_t usb_dev_runtime_dfu_get_state(void){ return usb_dev_runtime_dfu_status.bState; }
27 
28 
29 static inline void usb_dev_runtime_dfu_set_appDETACH(void) MCU_ALWAYS_INLINE;
30 void usb_dev_runtime_dfu_set_appDETACH(void){ usb_dev_runtime_dfu_status.bState = appDETACH; }
